titleStmt.title: 1801 - 1838 Merchant and Shipping Account Log Book from Black Rock, Fairfield, Connecticut
titleStmt.author: Thomas Bartram

respStmt.resp: XML mentorship, encoding, proof-reading, and processing provided by
Project management and XML encoding by

editionStmt.edition: First digital edition in TEI, date: 1 December 2016. P5.

availability.p: Reproduced by courtesy of the Connecticut Historical Society.
availability.licence: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License

msIdentifier.repository: Connecticut Historical Society in Hartford, CT

handNotes.handNote: Black ink. Probably a different hand from Bartram's drawing an X on pages .

editorialDecl.p: Bartram's spelling and punctuation are retained, except where a word is split at the end of a line and the beginning of the next in the manuscript. Where Bartram's spelling and hyphenation of words deviates from the standard, in order to facilitate searching we are using the TEI elements "choice," "sic," and "reg" to encode both Bartram's spelling and the regular international standard of Oxford English spelling, following the first listed spelling in the Oxford English Dictionary.

char.charName: LATIN UPPER T AND LATIN LOWER O
char.desc: Seen frequently at the start of a list item (looks similar to a cursive "To" or "%" symbol).
Seen frequently at the end of a list item (series of hyphens) used in manuscript to indicate connection between list item and price/cost.

char.charName: LATIN UPPER D AND LATIN LOWER O

char.desc: Frequently comes after name of person log entry is under.
